mdRecord.dcterms:title: Six sonatas for 2 common flutes or two German flutes and a bass: consisting of preludes, allmands, corants, sarabands, gavotts, and jiggs. Opera quarta, [Libro primo]

mdRecord.dcterms:description: Mixed set: Pts. 2 & 3 have title: Six sonata's a 3⁰ for two flutes or two German flutes and a bass .... Opera quarta. Libro primo. [London] Printed for the ye Author, engrav'd & sold by L. Pippard ..., [1713?] [original]
Library has: Libro primo: Fluto primo -- Fluto secondo -- Basso, Continuo o Violoncello. [original]
